sqlMap.sql: select u.PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID, u.PAYMENT_UPLOAD_NO, u.PAYMENT_NO, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.PAYMENT_AMOUNT, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.REQ_PSON_ID, u.REQ_PSON_NAME, u.TEL, u.PAYMENT_PATH, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_PAYMENT_UPLOAD u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt from DRP_PAYMENT_UPLOAD u
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_PAYMENT_UPLOAD( PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID, REQ_PSON_ID, CHANN_ID, AREA_ID, PAYMENT_UPLOAD_NO, PAYMENT_NO, PAYMENT_AMOUNT, REQ_PSON_NAME, TEL, PAYMENT_PATH, CHANN_NO, CHANN_NAME, AREA_NO, AREA_NAME, CRE_NAME, CREATOR, CRE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, STATE, REMARK, DEL_FLAG )values( #PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID#, #REQ_PSON_ID#, #CHANN_ID#, #AREA_ID#, #PAYMENT_UPLOAD_NO#, #PAYMENT_NO#, #PAYMENT_AMOUNT#, #REQ_PSON_NAME#, #TEL#, #PAYMENT_PATH#, #CHANN_NO#, #CHANN_NAME#, #AREA_NO#, #AREA_NAME#, #CRE_NAME#, #CREATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #STATE#, #REMARK#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_PAYMENT_UPLOAD
REQ_PSON_ID = #REQ_PSON_ID# CHANN_ID = #CHANN_ID# AREA_ID = #AREA_ID# PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID = #PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID# PAYMENT_UPLOAD_NO = #PAYMENT_UPLOAD_NO# PAYMENT_NO = #PAYMENT_NO# PAYMENT_AMOUNT = #PAYMENT_AMOUNT# REQ_PSON_NAME = #REQ_PSON_NAME# TEL = #TEL# CHANN_NO = #CHANN_NO# CHANN_NAME = #CHANN_NAME# AREA_NO = #AREA_NO# AREA_NAME = #AREA_NAME# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = sysdate STATE = #STATE# PAYMENT_PATH = #PAYMENT_PATH# REMARK = #REMARK#
where PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID = #PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_PAYMENT_UPLOAD set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID = #PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID, u.PAYMENT_UPLOAD_NO, u.PAYMENT_NO, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.PAYMENT_AMOUNT, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.REQ_PSON_ID, u.REQ_PSON_NAME, u.TEL, u.PAYMENT_PATH, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_PAYMENT_UPLOAD u where u.PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID = #PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID#
Select count(PAYMENT_NO) from DRP_PAYMENT_UPLOAD where PAYMENT_NO = #PAYMENT_NO#
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_PAYMENT_UPLOAD
UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPD_TIME = sysdate STATE = #STATE#
where PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID = #PAYMENT_UPLOAD_ID#
